Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes business franchise, personal income and insurance franchise tax credits for the expenses of employer provided or sponsored child care
Summary: Establishes business franchise, personal income and insurance franchise tax credits for the expenses of employer provided or sponsored child care.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing business franchise, personal income and insurance franchise tax credits for employer provided or sponsored child care
